formDescription: Please complete this comprehensive intake form to help us understand your health history, goals, and preferences for personalized weight loss coaching.

formSections.sectionDescription: Your current physical stats and goals

options.label: Extremely active (very hard exercise, physical job)

formSections.sectionDescription: Important health information for safe coaching

fields.label: Medical Conditions
fields.placeholder: List any medical conditions, chronic illnesses, or health concerns...
fields.helpText: Include: diabetes, thyroid issues, heart conditions, high blood pressure, PCOS, etc.

fields.label: Current Medications
fields.placeholder: List all medications, supplements, and vitamins you currently take...
fields.helpText: Include prescription medications, over-the-counter drugs, and supplements

fields.label: Food Allergies & Intolerances
fields.placeholder: List any food allergies, intolerances, or sensitivities...
fields.helpText: Include: gluten, dairy, nuts, shellfish, etc.

fields.label: Digestive Issues
fields.placeholder: Describe any digestive problems or concerns...
fields.helpText: Include: IBS, acid reflux, bloating, constipation, etc.

fields.label: Physical Limitations
fields.placeholder: Describe any physical limitations or injuries that affect exercise...
fields.helpText: Include: joint pain, back problems, mobility issues, recent surgeries, etc.

fields.label: Weight Loss Medications
fields.placeholder: List any weight loss medications or supplements you've used...
fields.helpText: Include: Ozempic, Wegovy, Contrave, over-the-counter supplements, etc.

formSections.sectionDescription: Your previous experiences with weight management

fields.label: Weight History
fields.placeholder: Describe your weight fluctuations over the years...
fields.helpText: Include: when you gained weight, life events that affected your weight, patterns you've noticed

fields.label: Previous Weight Loss Attempts
fields.placeholder: What diets or weight loss programs have you tried? What worked best and why?
fields.helpText: Include: Keto, Paleo, Low-Carb, Intermittent Fasting, Weight Watchers, etc.

fields.label: Challenging Aspects
fields.placeholder: What has been most challenging about losing weight in the past?
fields.helpText: Include: cravings, emotional eating, time constraints, motivation, etc.

formSections.sectionDescription: Your current eating and lifestyle habits

fields.label: Current Eating Habits
fields.placeholder: Describe your typical daily eating patterns...
fields.helpText: Include: meal timing, portion sizes, snacking habits, favorite foods, eating triggers

fields.label: Lifestyle Factors
fields.placeholder: Describe your daily routine, work schedule, and lifestyle factors...
fields.helpText: Include: work hours, stress levels, sleep patterns, family obligations, social activities

fields.label: Mindset & Emotional Factors
fields.placeholder: Describe your relationship with food and any emotional eating patterns...
fields.helpText: Include: stress eating, emotional triggers, body image concerns, self-sabotage patterns

fields.label: Goals & Expectations
fields.placeholder: What are your specific goals and what do you hope to achieve?
fields.helpText: Include: timeline, specific outcomes, lifestyle changes, health improvements

fields.label: Interested in Supplement Recommendations
fields.helpText: Check if you're open to receiving information about supplements that may support your weight loss goals

formSettings.successMessage: Thank you for completing the weight loss intake questionnaire. A coach will contact you soon.
formSettings.errorMessage: There was an error submitting your intake form. Please try again.
formSettings.requiredFieldsMessage: Please fill out all required fields before proceeding.
formSettings.privacyNotice: Your information is confidential and will only be used to provide personalized coaching services. We do not share your data with third parties.

templates.adminNotification: New weight loss intake form submitted
templates.clientConfirmation: Thank you for your weight loss intake submission
